mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_EMPLOYEE JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_NO) JOIN TB_COMPANY USING(CP_NO) JOIN TB_JOB_TITLE USING(JOB_TITLE_NO) where email=#{email} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update TB_EMPLOYEE set sessionKey = #{sessionId}, sessionLimit = #{next} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select * from TB_EMPLOYEE where sessionKey = #{sessionId} and sessionLimit > now()
mapper.insert: insert into tb_forjoin (email, random_num) values (#{email}, (select round(dbms_random.value()*1000000)+1 as RandomNum from dual))
